channel.title: Hosts SQL error! need a hand
channel.description:
Ok, so my command prompt runs fine when i do ::check ingame when it connects to the sql database on site and gives my reward for voting
But when my host runs it and it goes messed up when somebody tried to claim there reward.. im using runetoplistv2 vote system... and it worked perfectly other day for host untill i think his ip changed.. anybody have any idea how to fix
